LanguageData.EdB.ColonistBar.Prefs.SmallIcons.Tip: Select this option to display small icons in the colonist bar.\n\nThis option works best for smaller screen resolutions or colonies with lots of colonists.
LanguageData.EdB.ColorCodedWorkPassions.Pref: Color-code Passions for Manual Priority Numbers
LanguageData.EdB.ColorCodedWorkPassions.Pref.Tip: The manual priority numbers in the Work window are normally colored based on their priority number. Enable this option to use colors based on the colonists' passion level instead.
LanguageData.EdB.EmptyStockpile.Prefs.EmptyStockpile: Disable All Resources in New Stockpiles
Select this option to disable all resources in newly created stockpiles without having to click the "Clear All" button.\n\nThe first stockpile that you create is an exception and will always be created with the default options.
LanguageData.EdB.Inventory.Equipment.Error: Could not assign. Cannot reach item or item is no longer available.
LanguageData.EdB.Inventory.Prefs.EnableInventory.Tip: Display an Inventory button along the bottom of the screen. Click the button to count all of the item and resources owned by your colony.
LanguageData.EdB.MainTabCloseButton.Prefs.ShowCloseBu: Show a Close Button in All of the Main Tab Windows
Enable this option to display a close button as an "X" in the upper-right corner of each of the main tab windows.
LanguageData.EdB.MaterialSelection.Prefs.RightClickOn: Select Building Materials With Right-Click Only
Normally, you select materials by left-clicking or right-clicking on the building that you want to construct.\n\nEnable this option to select the material only when right-clicking.
LanguageData.EdB.PauseOnStart.Prefs.PauseOnStart: Pause a New or Loaded Game
LanguageData.EdB.PauseOnStart.Prefs.PauseOnStart.Tip: Selecting this option will pause the game when loading a saved game or starting a new game.\n\nThis is different than the option in vanilla RimWorld, which only pauses when loading a saved game.
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Prefs.AlwaysShowSquadName: Always Show the Squad Name in the Colonist Bar
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Prefs.AlwaysShowSquadName.Tip: Enable this option to always display the name of the currently active squad in the Colonist Bar.\n\nOtherwise, the name will be displayed only briefly when you change the currently active squad.
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Prefs.EnableSquadFiltering.Ti: Enable this option to display a filtering button in the Work, Restrictions and Outfit windows. Click the button to select a squad. Only colonists in that squad will be displayed in the list.
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Prefs.EnableSquadRow.Tip: Enable this option to display a row all the top of colonist lists in the Work, Restrictions and Outfit windows. Click in this row to apply the change to all of the colonists in the list.
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.DeleteColonist.Tip: Delete dead or missing colonists from all squads
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.DeleteColonist.Disable: Only dead or missing colonists can be deleted
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.DeleteSquad.Confirm: Are you sure that you want to delete this squad?
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.RemoveSquadMember.Disa: Cannot remove members from the All Colonists squad
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.SquadOption.ShowInBar: Show this squad in the colonist bar
LanguageData.EdB.Squads.Window.SquadOption.ShowInFilt: Include this squad in squad filter lists
